title: Immigration Consultant
experienceReq: minimum 3 year job experience
The applicants should have experience in the following business area(s):Travel Agent, Tour Operator, Immigration/Visa Processing
additional: Age at most 35 years
Both males and females are allowed to apply
responsibilities: Learn About Rules: Understand the rules for people moving to UK, USA, Canada, Australia & Europe.
Keep Updated: Stay updated with any new rules or changes.
Find the Right People: Figure out who might want to go to these countries, like students, workers, or tourists.
Help with Papers: Help people get their papers ready for applying for a visa.
Be Honest and Fair: Always tell the truth and be fair to people.
Keep in Touch: Talk to people and be helpful if they have questions.
Check How Things are Going: Look at how well the ads are working and make them better if needed.
Make Friends with Others: Get to know institutes, clubs, schools and groups that can help people move.
Know the Law: Understand the laws of each country really well.
Create Helpful Stuff: Make easy-to-understand posts, pictures, and videos about moving to these places.
Make Website Easy: Make sure the website is easy to use and shows up on Google.
Put Ads Online: Show ads on places like Google and Facebook so the right people see them.
Send Helpful Emails: Send emails with useful info to people who want to know more.
Others: Any other tasks assigned by the Management.

title: অ্যাকাউন্টস অফিসার
experienceReq: minimum 3 year job experience
The applicants should have experience in the following business area(s):Travel Agent, Tour Operator, Immigration/Visa Processing
additional: Only males are allowed to apply
অ্যাকাউন্টস বিভাগে কমপক্ষে ৫-৬ বছর বাস্তব কাজের অভিজ্ঞতা থাকতে হবে।
ছাত্রাবস্থায় আবেদন করার প্রয়োজন নাই।
responsibilities: কম্পিউটারে বাংলা ইংরেজী টাইপিং দক্ষতা ২৫+ থাকতে হবে।
কম্পিউটার অফিস এপ্লিকেশন- এম এস ওয়ার্ড,এক্সেল বিশেষ দক্ষতা থাকতে হবে।
কম্পিউটারাইজড অ্যাকাউন্টিং সফটওয়্যারে সকল লেনদেন সমূহের রেকর্ড রাখতে হবে।
দৈনন্দিন ভাউচার, ক্যাশবুক, লেজার লিপিবন্ধকরনের বাস্তব অভিজ্ঞতা থাকতে হবে
চলতি এবং অনাদায়ী নগদান হিসাবগুলির সংগ্রহের কার্য পরিচালনা করতে হবে।
দৈনন্দিন, সাপ্তাহিক এবং মাসিক ভিত্তিক একাউন্টস ভলিউম এবং ব্যালেন্স সংরক্ষণ এবং রিপোর্ট তৈরি করতে হবে।
মাসিক এবং বার্ষিক রিপোর্ট সমূহ তৈরি, সংগ্রহ এবং সংরক্ষণ করতে হবে।
বিভিন্ন ধরনের ক্রেতা/ বিক্রেতা, সাপ্লাইয়ার বা সরবরাহকারীদের জন্য ওয়ার্কঅর্ডার তৈরি, বিল এবং চালান গ্রহণ পূর্বক, তা ওয়ার্ক অর্ডার অনুযায়ী যাচাই করে সংরক্ষণ করতে হবে ।
সরবরাহকারীদের চুক্তি অনুসারে ইনভয়েস এবং পেমেন্ট অনুমোদনের ব্যবস্থা নিতে হবে।
দৈনন্দিন ব্যাংকিং কার্যক্রম যেমন- ব্যাংক জমা, এল.সি ও অন্যান্য কার্যক্রম সম্পাদন করতে হবে।

responsibilities: As the Admin Manager, you will play a crucial role in maintaining the hospital's administrative functions Your responsibilities will include but are not limited to:
Administrative Responsibilities:
Overseeing the daily administrative operations of the hospital.
Managing and supervising administrative staff.
Coordinating meetings, appointments, and schedules for hospital executives.
Handling financial and budgetary matters related to the administrative department.

Managing records, documentation, and correspondence.
Collaborating with other departments to ensure smooth operations.
Resolving administrative issues and conflicts promptly.
Developing and implementing a comprehensive PR and communication strategy.
Organizing and promoting hospital events, seminars, and community outreach programs.
Managing the hospital's social media presence and online reputation.
Monitoring media coverage and preparing reports.
Responding to media inquiries.
Crisis management and handling sensitive situations with tact and discretion.

title: Immigration Consultant
experienceReq: 8 to 12 year(s)
The applicants should have experience in the following area(s):
Work Study
The applicants should have experience in the following business area(s):
Buying House, Garments
additional: Age 30 to 40 years
Only males are allowed to apply
A very good knowledge of IE-functions related to RMG industries is a must
Should have sufficient knowledge of all technical aspects related to garments production and quality etc.
Lean Practitioner.
Must be familiar with the current happenings in RMG related IE
Must know the steps of modern order execution
A solid knowledge of globally accepted Quality Standard is a must
Proficiency in English language, both written and spoken, is essential
Should have excellent command in Computer Operation particularly in MS Office
responsibilities: Develop, manage implement, communicate, and maintain a quality plan
Participate in PP meetings to identify the risks of all new styles.
Work with the PP team to make sure all quality issues were addressed before line start.
Conduct style review meetings with the sewing line team.
Follow up the line feeding checklist
First output review against the sample and technical file including measurements.
Need to finalize the CTC, CTS, and CTQ quality points and explain them to the quality inspector & quality supervisors.
If any style runs in more than one line approved; duplicate trim card for each line
Review size set garments with approved samples and provide necessary comments if required for bulk production.
Check the measurement of size set garments and keep the record in the size set report.

Check first cutting /output garments as per buyer standard and provide comments with corrections monitor the defective, DHU, and FRI reports to identify the continued defects and work with the respective production team to get it correct.
Work with respective cross-functional teams on corrective actions if any failures are found in the above process
If any discrepancies happen need to inform the QA Manager to take action.
Discuss buying office inline inspection findings with the cross-functional team to get the corrective actions.
Drive RFT, Six Sigma, TQM/TQC, RCA, CAPA, etc. culture.
Sound knowledge in Technical audit/GMP/FCCA etc.
Perform plan problem-solving and continuous improvement sessions weekly with the team members.
Follow up on the executive's and supervisor's daily routine and their work actions.
Monitor all QA/QC operations and per-production activities to ensure that an end product meets the customer quality requirements within AQL.
Ensure garment quality as per quality parameters and buyers' direction.
Conversant in AQL standards and thorough knowledge of the entire QC process from pattern to finished garment.
To deal with the buyers independently for all quality assurance activities including quality control/audit, in-line inspection, pre-final and final inspection.
Any other responsibility assigned by the Management as per company requirements.

title: Dyeing In Charge
experienceReq: minimum 3 year job experience
The applicants should have experience in the following business area(s):Travel Agent, Tour Operator, Immigration/Visa Processing
additional: Age 25 to 40 years
Only males are allowed to apply
responsibilities: Maintain quality standard, rules and regulations for achieving the quality of the products.
Monitoring and reporting activities of Quality Assurance.
Online, Offline fabric Quality Control & Monitoring.
Follow up Fabric inspection done by 4 point system.
Color continuity/Shade continuity maintain batch to batch also shade check with approved shade.
Follow up GSM check, batch wise & roll wise.
Shrinkage, Twisting report check with another Lab test report.
Ensure Delivered fabric Quality with maintain SOP.
Find out quality problem & solve for own Shift.
Arrange training/meeting for all Quality inspector by own Shift.
Setting Q.I team and ensuring that targets are quality achieved any other task assigned by the higher authority.
Co-ordinate with Management on any requirement that can't be met.
Report any deviation in 4-Point system to Head of Quality Dept.
Any other assignment given by the top management.

title: Immigration Consultant
experienceReq: minimum 3 year job experience
The applicants should have experience in the following business area(s):Travel Agent, Tour Operator, Immigration/Visa Processing
additional: Age at most 35 years
Both males and females are allowed to apply
responsibilities: Learn About Rules: Understand the rules for people moving to UK, USA, Canada, Australia & Europe.
Keep Updated: Stay updated with any new rules or changes.
Find the Right People: Figure out who might want to go to these countries, like students, workers, or tourists.
Help with Papers: Help people get their papers ready for applying for a visa.
Be Honest and Fair: Always tell the truth and be fair to people.
Keep in Touch: Talk to people and be helpful if they have questions.
Check How Things are Going: Look at how well the ads are working and make them better if needed.
Make Friends with Others: Get to know institutes, clubs, schools and groups that can help people move.
Know the Law: Understand the laws of each country really well.
Create Helpful Stuff: Make easy-to-understand posts, pictures, and videos about moving to these places.
Make Website Easy: Make sure the website is easy to use and shows up on Google.
Put Ads Online: Show ads on places like Google and Facebook so the right people see them.
Send Helpful Emails: Send emails with useful info to people who want to know more.
Others: Any other tasks assigned by the Management.
